response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase the product directly from us at a special price of $100. This represents a great opportunity for you to save while enjoying the benefits of our product. Please let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer.", "product_price": 100}
